articles.author: Andre Janse Van Vuuren, Indy Scholtens
articles.title: US Stock Futures Slip as Traders Eye New Catalysts: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: European stocks powered higher for a fourth day as investors snapped up mining shares. US stock futures paused after the S&P 500 closed just shy of an all-time high.
articles.content:
European stocks powered higher for a fourth day as investors snapped up mining shares. US stock futures paused after the S&P 500 closed just shy of an all-time high.
